## createTileMovement() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Create a tile movement move.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createTileMovement(from: HexCoordinate, to: HexCoordinate): TileMovement;
```

The coordinate where the tile is move to.


</td></tr>

**Returns:**

[TileMovement](./hive-lib.tilemovement.md)

A move indicating movement of a tile from the specified coordinate to the specified destination.
